      • sendNewConnection

        public void sendNewConnection(ArrayList<SendProtocol> transferReq)
        Send new connection details as a list. Because updates are send as a list, sending new single connection details can't recognize by client side.
        Parameters:
        transferReq - details about new connection server ArrayList
